entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming east 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 12.
